step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Keep your arm straight overhead, feeling that gentle resistance.
Excellent! Now, focus on stretching your arm straight overhead. Ensure you feel the intended resistance throughout the movement.
Great! Open your palm and fingers wide. This is key to preparing for the pumping action.
Well done! Make a fist while inhaling and tightening your muscles. Remember to visualize the fluid moving.
Good start to the second repetition. Maintain a comfortable seated or standing posture with your arm extended overhead.
Nicely done. Continue to keep your arm straight overhead, ensuring you feel the resistance as instructed.
Excellent! Keep those palms and fingers spread wide as you prepare for the next step.
Perfect! Inhale as you make a fist and tighten your muscles. Keep visualizing that lymph flow.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance. Opening your hand wide and making a fist while inhaling helps pump the lymph fluid effectively. Keep up the good work!
